message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY 

This paper is about sentiment analysis using natural language processing techniques, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also involves the use of machine learning algorithms for classification, which is a common topic in information retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of an ontology for seed selection and expansion is a graph-based approach, which could also be categorized under machine learning and graph theory (cs.LG). Finally, the paper is specifically focused on generating a sentiment lexicon for Persian, which could fall under the sub-category of computational linguistics for specific languages (cs.CY).
